agus.gunit.vessel

Class PARTS

  • java.lang.Object
    • agus.gunit.vessel.PARTS

  • public class PARTS
extends java.lang.Object
    TODO search for parts(Engines, antennas) may not need to update completely every time

    This class allows fast access to all parts of the vessel.

    It does so by traversing the vessel as a tree and giving each part a number, id.

    Author:
    Niklas Heidenreich

    • Method Detail

      • autoUpdatePartList

        public void autoUpdatePartList(float intervall)
        TODO not implemented yet!!!!

        It is not recommended to update the partlist midflight!!! will create a thread that automatically updates the partlist

        Parameters:
        intervall - the interval at which to update in seconds

      • updateOrderedPartList

        public krpc.client.services.SpaceCenter.Part[] updateOrderedPartList()

        It is not recommended to update the partlist midflight!!! This method will update the partlist by traversing recursively through all the parts.

        This will create ~ 2kb of traffic

        Returns:
        an array filled with parts, where every part is matched to the id they have in the array

      • getOrderedPartList

        public krpc.client.services.SpaceCenter.Part[] getOrderedPartList()
        This will return the Partlist of the last time it was updated. This list may be out dated, if the vessel has docked with an other vessel, or performed staging.

        To update it use updateOrderedPartList

        Returns

        Returns:
        an array filled with parts, where every part is matched to the id they have in the array.

      • outprintVesselTreeStructure

        public void outprintVesselTreeStructure(java.lang.String dir,
                                        java.lang.String name)
        Will create a .txt document at the given location and with the given name

        Leaving the value of both strings empty will result in an system outprint

        Parameters:
        dir - the directory where the file should be stored
        name - the name of the file

        public krpc.client.services.SpaceCenter.Part getPartWithId(int id)
        Returns the part with the given id
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the part
        Returns:
        the part

      • getMaximumAntennaRange

        public double getMaximumAntennaRange()
        Searches for the antenna with the maximum range
        Returns:

      • updateOrderedPartListRecursive

        private int updateOrderedPartListRecursive(krpc.client.services.SpaceCenter.Part[] parts,
                                           krpc.client.services.SpaceCenter.Part root,
                                           int id)
        Recursivly searches through the vessel to create the partlist
        Parameters:
        parts - the partlist
        root - the root part
        id - the id of the root part Default 0
        Returns:
        the id of the current root part
